channel.title: incubation on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in incubation on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Hot Desking and Incubation Centres in Cork
item.description: I recently had a great meeting with Paul Healy of the Rubicon Incubation Centre in CIT in Cork. This has been a runaway success since it opened a year ago and I wanted to find out more. The Centre is probably best know for the Genesis Enterprise Programme but actually offers a lot more than this. The Centre has not had a lot of marketing around it and I wondered why.
